name: AnimalMatch
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal match
des:
Sharpen your short-term memory with this classic matching game!

FEATURES
• Good for all ages with ten levels to play, each more challenging than the last
• Unlimited access to five levels for free. Unlock five more with Animal Match Pro.
• Touch-based interactions to flip cards over
• Automatically keeps track of progress

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap a level to play it
• Find matches by tapping cards to flip them over
• The fewer misses you make, the more stars you'll earn
• Each level you complete, unlocks the next one 
• Clearing the levels only resets your stars. You will not lose access to any levels you've unlocked or purchased.
• Shoot for the stars! And earn all 30 of them by mastering each level.

COMPATIBILITY
Animal Match is a visual game and requires a compatible device with a screen. Currently, Animal Match is only supported on the Echo Show 15, 10, 8 and 5.

FEEDBACK
Ideas? Issues? Questions? If you'd like to leave feedback or get in touch, please leave us an e-mail at whoa.labs.for.alexa@gmail.com. We love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
